fitalgorithms.admin module¶

fitalgorithms.algorithms module¶

fitalgorithms.algorithms.None2Zero(body_part_variant_list)[source]¶

We convert body part value hips/waist/shoulder to zero if it’s None Those required attribures body parts do not need to fill all of them Hence we specify which is required by the product type, for example jeans doesn’t require to get shoulder value from each variant of the product

fitalgorithms.tests module¶

fitalgorithms.urls module¶

fitalgorithms.urls.fit_product_router = <rest_framework.routers.DefaultRouter object>¶

here we have different api for authenticated and non authenticated profiles we need profile data such as height,weight,bust,hips,etc… and the product_id

fitalgorithms.urls.predict_router = <rest_framework.routers.DefaultRouter object>¶

here predict process is profile ignostic, we just need height and weight with its coressponding metrics cm/inch , kg/lb respectively

fitalgorithms.urls.stillInFittingRoom_router = <rest_framework.routers.DefaultRouter object>¶

Every time interval that front-end and backend agreed upon this will be called to update time spent on fitting room by specific profile hence we don’t need to know what the profile is, we are using token based authentication with this api because these info is required for authenticated and non authenticated profiles
